transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ah sir, good morning. Vineet baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ha bhai ji.
Executive: Sir, aapse ek do cheeze puchni thi. Aap ye jo maine aapko bheja tha ye export wala discussion aapse kisi aur se hua hai kya?
Customer: Are nahi yaar faltu are are faltu log phone kar rahe hain. Kya discussion mujhe lagta hai unhone unhone unhone hi to sir ye aapko cheez aapke dimag mein hi dal di ki aap export kara lo.
Customer: Are nahi nahi nahi nahi. Main batata hu hua kya. Main Mumbai mein tha aise random ek ladke ka phone aaya. To main bola theek hai ek bar sochte hain to usko lag raha hai kya bolte hain main jab maine usko inform kiya ki bhai already panch log isme involve hain. Mera manager Sonu, uska senior Vineet aur do char log aur. To aap kya bolte hain mat ghuso. 20 log already involve hain isliye wo kya bolte hain nahi jaroorat hai. Sonu ne mujhe bataya ki sir ki baat unse ho rahi hai to aisa mujhe lagta hai ki sir ko unhone ye cheez bata di aur isliye sir nahi nahi nahi are nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi pata nahi samjhe pata kya hua kahani.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Dekho na Friday ko yaad hai Friday ko hamara discussion hua hai. Ab mujhe lena hi tha cheeze aur 3 lakh ka option tha ab aaj aap ye to bol raha hai ki kya bolte hain sir 3 lakh ka loan to mil jayega lekin kya bolte hain 12 mahine hi aapko samay milega. Maine kaha nahi bhai rehne de phir.
To mujhe thoda sa kya bolte hain samay chahiye kam se kam kya bolte hain aapka ye 24 mahina. To aise hi log faltu log phone kar rahe hain IndiaMART se bhosdi ke. Paisa dena chahiye to kya bolte hain 20 log hamesha hamesha ghuse hue hain paisa lene ke liye. [inaudible]
Executive: Are wo hamari export team hai na unka mere ko bhi ek do bar call aaya maine unko bataya ki abhi time lagega.
Customer: Keh do keh do kya bolte hain mana kar rahe hain wo next time ki. [inaudible]
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Pata rasta rasta nahi bata rahe hain kya bolte hain bhai ji agar aise aise karenge to ghoda meri gaand mein ghus raha hai kya paisa do. Kahan se laau paisa? Hai nahi to ab pata dikkat pata bhai ji kya hai ab mere sath kya dikkat hai bhai ji. Jaise mere pass aapse baat ho rahi hai na ab aapse itni baat ho gayi ki nahi ab sab kuch kya bolte hain Vineet se karunga main. Ye wali baat hai. Bhosdi ke roj naya naya log aake kya bolte hain gaand mein ghus rahe hain. Ab ye jo honest batau Sonu ko kya bolte hain follow up pe lane ke liye hum log ko mujhe bhi aapko bhi teen mahine lag gaye bhai. Teen mahine lag gaya Sonu ko kya bolte hain ek ek us pe lane ke liye hamare hamare hamare beech mein lane ke liye. Ab Sonu se bhi kya bolte hain theek thak baat ho rahi hai to bhosdi ke roj kabhi na koi naya aake phone kar raha hai. Yaar tu.
Executive: Main nahi bolta unko call wall na karne ke liye.
Customer: Ab bol do seedha bol do. Kyuki bhosdi ke paisa hai to unko de de phir. Fir wo fir wo kya bolte hain wo wo karega baat karega. Ab issue batao Vineet bhai agar aapko aawaz break ho rahi hai kahi out of network hai kya aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi. Ab ab aawaz aa rahi hai ab?
Executive: Ha abhi clear aa rahi hai.
Customer: Are mere kehne ka matlab ye hai ki agar IndiaMART ko kuch bhi karna hoga to pehle main aapko phone nahi karunga. Nahi to bahar. Accha sir mujhe mujhe to aap pe pura bharosa hai maine kaha aisa IndiaMART wale sab hote hain na sir sab log apna sabko sabko sabko apna kya bolte hain koti set karni hoti hai samajh gaya main. Hmm kya isliye main maine kaha aisa na ho mere ko pata hi na lage sir unse baat kar le maine kaha aap karao aap karaoge are dekho aap karao wo bhi sakte ho lekin usme kya hai na aap khali export maine kal aapko bheja tha na calculation aap export kara rahe ho aur wo kara rahe ho kitna alag plan pad raha hai.
Hmm. Ye wohi wohi baat hai wo to tarike se aap export le lo unko dusre se matlab nahi hai. Vineet bhai Vineet bhai actually ab bacche nahi reh gaye ki koi bhi aake kya bolte hain aapko wo kar de gumrah kar de kya. Wo chutiye bomb phode hain waise chutiye nahi hai bhai. Koi bhi aake kya bolte hain wo kar de gumrah kar de. Hai na? Ek bar discussion to hoga hi ab kya ek bar baat chit to hogi hi hogi. Yaad hai beech beech mein kya bolte hain unko bhi loop mein le leta hu kya bolte hain aapke aapke jo manager sahab the wo. Aapki aawaz bahut break ho rahi hai aaj. Ab phone karta hu aapko phone kar raha hu bhai ji. Mere wale number pe kijiye.
Customer: Ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving unwanted calls from IndiaMART.

- Dissatisfied with the lack of coordination.

- Frustrated with multiple people contacting him.

- Expresses concern about loan terms.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Executive assured to stop unwanted calls.

- Executive acknowledged the customer's trust.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call the executive back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- unwanted calls, export, loan, coordination
